title.rendered: iPhone 7 – Pay Monthly Contract Deals With No Upfront Cost

content.rendered:
The iPhone 7 was extremely similar the iPhone 6 and 6s to look at. The upgrades really came inside the handset. It came with better sound, better screen resolution and the camera software has been updated to give it an edge on previous iPhone models. As with all older generation mobile phones the cost has drastically dropped. You can now find some amazing iPhone 7 contract deals with no upfront cost.

iPhone 7 Sound

This was the first generation of Apple mobiles to lose the 3.5MM jack. It did cause a bit of controversy between hardcore apple fanatics but it as also one of the main issues of faults with the common cause of damage being pocket lint going into the jack.

Apple do provide an adapter and the sound is brilliant but there is one drawback. You can’t charge whilst listening to music which is often the most common cause of a drained mobile phone battery.

iPhone 7 Display

The device comes with a 4.7-inch screen with 750 x 1334 resolution. In comparison to the iPhone 8 and iPhone X is doesn’t compare but watching a movie or streaming a YouTube video is still extremely good for an older generation handset.

iPhone 7 main features

The main feature update for the iPhone 7 compared to the iPhone 6 is the A10 Fusion Chip. This is a quad core processor which combines two high efficiency and two high performance cores. Apples bold claim stated that this made the iPhone 7 40 percent quicker with improved graphics performance of up to 50 percent.

The iPhone 7 really did make a jump in terms of power. The main reason for the removal of the headphone jack was to place a larger battery in the device. The upgrade in battery does give the iPhone 7 an extra 2 hours over the iPhone 6.

iPhone 7 Camera

The device comes with 12MP and a wider F1/8 aperture to give you wider shots. Apple upgraded the True Tone flash from two colours to four. This gives the pictures a much more natural tone on any photo.We have hundreds of iPhone 7 pay monthly contract plans and most come with cashback, a free phone and an addon from the network. Choose from EE plans or Vodafone plans to get the best deal online.

If you can’t find the plan you are after, contact our team on 0333 900 1133, our team will help you find the best deal on any iPhone tariff.
